resources.string: You must turn on WiFi and connect to the STVS or the STVS-N wireless network for Caster to work properly.
Welcome to Caster. Swipe in from the side menu to connect up to the building\'s media server. After connecting to the media server you will be able to browse through the folders of the media server.

Once you\'ve located the file you would like to play, you have two options to play it. You can connect to one of the chromecast devices using the cast button in the top right corner of this app, or you can play the file directly on your device. Once connected to a chromecast, selecting a file will automatically play that file on the TV the chromecast is connected to. When playing a file locally on your android device, we recommend installing the VLC media player as it is capable of playing most files without any issues.
